name: Congestive Heart Failure
description: A chronic cardiac condition affecting primarily older adults with significant mortality risk if untreated or managed informally. Requires substantial hospital-level care.
ai_interventions_impact: Hospital Decision Support AI improves hospital resolution rates by 10% and reduces mortality by 15%.

name: Tuberculosis
description: A serious infectious disease with very slow resolution requiring 25+ weeks of treatment. Has low but persistent mortality and high disability impact.
ai_interventions_impact: CHW Decision Support AI is especially effective for improving treatment adherence at community level.

name: Pneumonia
description: A respiratory infection with very high incidence in children under five. Good resolution rates with appropriate antibiotics but significant mortality if untreated.
ai_interventions_impact: Diagnostic AI significantly improves resolution rates at primary care level.

name: Malaria
description: A parasitic disease with moderate-high incidence in endemic areas. Good response to appropriate treatment at CHW/primary levels.
ai_interventions_impact: CHW Decision Support AI enables more effective community-level treatment.

name: Fever of Unknown Origin
description: A symptomatic presentation with diverse underlying causes affecting all ages. Features moderate spontaneous resolution and good response to healthcare interventions.
ai_interventions_impact: Diagnostic AI helps identify underlying causes faster at primary care level.

name: Diarrheal Disease
description: An acute gastrointestinal condition with very high incidence especially in children. Excellent response to ORS/Zinc and can be effectively managed at community level.
ai_interventions_impact: Self-Care Apps improve home management outcomes and reduce need for formal care.

name: Infant Pneumonia
description: A more severe form of pneumonia in infants under 1 year. Features lower spontaneous resolution and requires more intensive management.
ai_interventions_impact: Hospital Decision Support AI significantly improves infant mortality rates.

name: Anemia
description: A nutritional condition affecting primarily women and children. Very low mortality but causes persistent disability until resolved.
ai_interventions_impact: CHW Decision Support AI helps identify severe anemia cases requiring referral.

name: HIV Management (Chronic)
description: Focuses on stable HIV patients on antiretroviral therapy. Very low "resolution" rates without formal care but good stabilization with appropriate ART.
ai_interventions_impact: Self-Care Apps significantly improve treatment adherence and outcomes.

name: High-Risk Pregnancy (Low ANC)
description: Pregnancy complications without adequate prenatal monitoring. Very poor outcomes without formal care but good resolution with hospital management.
ai_interventions_impact: Triage AI helps identify high-risk cases earlier for timely intervention.

name: Upper Respiratory Tract Infection
description: Common viral respiratory infection with excellent spontaneous resolution and minimal additional benefit from healthcare intervention.
ai_interventions_impact: Self-Care Apps effectively manage symptoms and reduce unnecessary facility visits.
